column1: The Purple Pig////I came here on a Thursday night around 7 and there was a ~45 minute wait for a party of 2. The place is very crowded and tight as most people have mentioned
column2: but it makes sense because the place is very popular so I'd prefer that over an extra long wait. After I got the text notifying me of my table being ready
column3: we were seated right away and our waiter was there quickly.
